help: Adds an administrator to your fleet. You can optionally specify his or her tier (0-3), and faction (currently only affects name/portrait). If all of these are left empty, a tier 0 administrator of the player faction will be created.
Will attempt to force an innovation, put 1 to guarantee an innovation. Put 0 to never have an innovation. The default will be used at BCAgeOfInnovation's setting.json value  then
